channel.title: Posts on Tanay Garde
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tanay Garde

item.title: Hello World
item.description: My first sample post for this site.
item.content:
Welcome to my blog! This is a sample “Hello World” post to show how posts will look on the site. I’ll add more content here later.

  • This site uses the hello-friend-ng theme.
  • Posts live under content/posts/.

Thanks for reading — edit this post to replace it with your own content.

item.title: My Projects
item.description: Short tour of projects I’m working on.
item.content:
Here are a few projects I’m tinkering with:

  1. A personal site built with Hugo and hello-friend-ng.
  2. Small scripts and experiments in Python and JavaScript.

I’ll flesh these out in later posts with links and screenshots.

item.title: Thoughts on Coding
item.content:
Coding is often as much about reading as it is about writing. I jot down small thoughts here as examples for the theme.

  • Keep things small and testable.
  • Prefer readability over cleverness.

This is a placeholder post — replace it with your real content.
